data.question: What year did Holleman describe the conversion of phenylnitromethane into the sodium salt?
What is the molar ratio of the title compound 2-Li when it crystallizes with ethanol?
What type of structure is formed by the lithium atoms in the crystal structure of [2-Li.C2H50H]?
Is the C7-N8 bond length in the [2-Li.C2H50H] crystal structure significantly shorter compared to similar bonds in uncharged nitro compounds?
What is the role of ethanol in the crystal structure of [2-Li.C2H50H]?
data.answer: Ethanol is used as solvent and is incorporated into the crystal structure.

data.question: Does the presence of OH...O hydrogen bonds in [2-Li.C2H50H] agree with findings from acidity measurements on nitro compounds?
What is the pKa value of nitromethane in water?
Can the structure of [2-Li.C2H50H] be used to support assumptions about protonation reactions?
data.answer: Yes, but it requires further examples to support the assumption.

data.question: Is the ylide anion compound 5 isolated as a yellow powder?
What is the IR spectrum nitrile band position of compound 5?
Does the resonance structure 5b contribute to the electron distribution in compound 5?
What is the coupling constant Jpc for the ylidic C atom in compound 5?
Does compound 5 have a smaller P-C-C angle compared to open-chain phosphacumulene ylides?
What reaction product is formed when compound 5 reacts with halogen compounds 6?
Are cyanomethylenetriphenylphosphoranes 7 more readily accessible in greater variety than previously due to compound 5?
What is the role of sodium bis(trimethylsilyl)amide 4 in the synthesis of compound 5?
data.answer: It is used to deprotonate cyanomethylenetriphenylphosphorane 3.

data.question: Is the [2-Li.C2H50H] crystal structure further stabilized by internal hydrogen bonds?
What is the significance of the bond angles being larger than 120 degrees in the [2-Li.C2H50H] crystal structure?
data.answer: It indicates a reduction of the van der Waals repulsion between H1 and 010.

data.question: Does the geometry of the hydrogen bonds in [2-Li.C2H50H] match that normally found for such bonds?
What is the yield of the colorless, needle-shaped crystals of [2-Li.C2H50H]?
